headline: Looking At The Changing Narrative For Entergy (ETR) As Growth Assumptions Shift
summary: Entergy’s latest price target tweak is small on paper, with a model fair value estimate moving from US$103.61 to US$104.26, but it reflects a meaningful shift in how recent research is framing the story around future demand and growth. Analysts raising their targets are tying that move to expectations for industrial load in the Gulf Coast and new customer agreements, such as the recent deal with Google in Arkansas, which they see as reinforcing confidence in Entergy’s growth plans. Stay tuned...

headline: Entergy and NiSource Could Be Winners as Utilities Spend $1 Trillion on AI. Dividend Investors Not So Much
summary: Utilities are plowing growing profits into new power plants, and their soaring share prices mean that dividend yields are dropping.
